job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Key projects:

• As a Senior Site Reliability Engineer, you will be responsible for the day-to-day maintenance, operational support, and reliability of Internet-based and in-store systems.

• On an on­going basis, this position will help identify root causes of operational issues and partner with other team members to drive resolution.



Daily Responsibilities:

• Provide break/fix, customer support, and communication to product teams

• Create and manage Service Level Indicators (SLIs), and Service Level Objectives (SLOs) using New Relic, and Splunk

• Resolve performance bottlenecks using data from monitoring tools, and profiling utilities like dotTrace, dotMemory, and PerfView

• Manage configuration of monitoring, and alerting in New Relic, Splunk, and Pager Duty

• Implement OS, and application changes as needed using Chef and Jenkins

• Create and maintain system, process, and training documentation

• Drive root cause analysis and post-mortem as needed

• Conduct monthly OS patching and deploy OS, application, and infrastructure changes



Qualifications:

• 4-6+ years supporting external, customer-facing web services for a large site

• 4-6+ years installing, configuring, and troubleshooting Windows-based systems and services using IIS and MSSQL

• 2-3+ years using Chef to manage servers in Windows environment

• 2-3+ years using Splunk, New Relic, and Pager Duty in a large, customer-facing environment

• 2-3+ years managing VIPs, pools, and members on F5 Big IP

• Outstanding troubleshooting, attention to detail, written and spoken communication skills.

• Experience defining and using Service Level Indicators (SLIs), and Service Level Objectives (SLOs)
